attributes.action: Save the "Hole  In The Wall" Oatcake shop in Hanley, Stoke on Trent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is the last remaining hole-in-the wall oatcake shop in Stoke on Trent.
The Oatcake is an intrigal part of Staffordshire life - it is not found natrually in any other area of the planet.
We want the shop to be preserved in it's current situ or rebuilt, brick by brick in a central position within the city.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the "Hole In The Wall" Oatcake shop in Hanley, Stoke on Trent."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19553


Prime Minister's Office
